author: David Harrison
title: Fed Survey: Americans See Brighter Economic Prospects, but Fragility Remains
text:
Americans report steady improvements in their financial well-being and more of them are optimistic about their future employment prospects, according to a Federal Reserve survey released Tuesday. But peopleâ€™s perceptions of their economic situation varied by race and educational attainment.
The report also found persistent signs of economic fragility, with many workers continuing to struggle to save for unexpected emergencies or retirement. More than a quarter had skipped medical treatment due to cost, the report said.
